notes: SafeCred 2.0: The Customization & Security Mega Update!
releaseNotes:
- Added Desktop/Android System-level Autofill Service
- Added Trash / Recycle Bin with 30-day auto-cleanup
- Added One-Tap Copy Notification with 30s auto-clear timer
- Added Theme Engine with customizable accent colors
- Added Compact View Mode for better vault density
- Improved clipboard security and notification handling
- Enhanced UI responsiveness and theme consistency
